mil3.6.9:1.2_1: yaṁ panetaṁ brūsi ‘saṁsāro’ti, katamo so saṁsāro”ti?
mil3.6.9:1.3_0: “Idha, mahārāja, jāto idheva marati, idha mato aññatra uppajjati, tahiṁ jāto tahiṁyeva marati,
mil3.6.9:1.3_1: tahiṁ mato aññatra uppajjati, evaṁ kho, mahārāja, saṁsāro hotī”ti.
mil3.6.9:1.5_1: kocideva puriso pakkaṁ ambaṁ khāditvā aṭṭhiṁ ropeyya,
mil3.6.9:1.5_2: tato mahanto ambarukkho nibbattitvā phalāni dadeyya,
mil3.6.9:1.5_3: atha so puriso tatopi pakkaṁ ambaṁ khāditvā aṭṭhiṁ ropeyya,
mil3.6.9:1.5_4: tatopi mahanto ambarukkho nibbattitvā phalāni dadeyya,
mil3.6.9:1.6_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, idha jāto idheva marati, idha mato aññatra uppajjati, tahiṁ jāto tahiṁyeva marati,
mil3.6.9:1.6_1: tahiṁ mato aññatra uppajjati, evaṁ kho, mahārāja, saṁsāro hotī”ti.
